Docs.summary: A class to encapsulate rating information used as content metadata.

Docs.summary: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable's marshalled representation.

Docs.summary: Return whether the rating is "heart selected".
Docs.value: true if the rating is "heart selected", false if the rating is "heart unselected", if the rating style is not #RATING_HEART or if it is unrated.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return whether there is a rating value available.
Docs.value: true if the instance was not created with #newUnratedRating(int).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return whether the rating is "thumb up".
Docs.value: true if the rating is "thumb up", false if the rating is "thumb down", if the rating style is not #RATING_THUMB_UP_DOWN or if it is unrated.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.

Docs.param: true for a "heart selected" rating, false for "heart unselected".
Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with a heart-based rating.

Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with a percentage-based rating.
Docs.returns: null if the rating is out of range, a new Rating instance otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.Rating NewStarRating (Android.Media.RatingStyle starRatingStyle, float starRating);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.Rating NewStarRating(valuetype Android.Media.RatingStyle starRatingStyle, float32 starRating) cil managed
static member NewStarRating : Android.Media.RatingStyle * single -> Android.Media.Rating

Docs.param: a number ranging from 0.0f to 3.0f, 4.0f or 5.0f according to the rating style.
Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with a star-based rating.
Docs.returns: null if the rating style is invalid, or the rating is out of range, a new Rating instance otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with no rating.
Docs.returns: null if an invalid rating style is passed, a new Rating instance otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the percentage-based rating value.
Docs.value: a rating value greater or equal to 0.0f, or a negative value if the rating style is not percentage-based, or if it is unrated.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
